item.title: WATCH: Airman surprises siblings in early Christmas present
item.description: Stacie Garrett shared a TikTok video of her eldest son surprising her younger kids ahead of Christmas.

item.title: For 2nd time, grand jury refuses to indict New York AG Letitia James: Sources
item.description: For a second time in a week, a federal grand jury in Virginia has refused to indict New York Attorney General Letitia James for alleged mortgage fraud...

item.title: Gas explosion in San Francisco Bay Area damages homes, sends heavy smoke into air
item.description: A gas explosion has started a major fire in a San Francisco Bay Area neighborhood, damaging several homes and sending heavy smoke into the air
